overview: Leo Ford figures if he can make it in New York, he can make it anywhere, so the West Coast's blond wonder hits the Big Apple with stars in his eyes and a permanent hard-on. He's looking for men who share his hunger for hot sex. He finds them in the form of the paperboy, some weightlifting studs, and numerous hung strangers. When all is said and done, New York City isn't such a lonely scene after all â€” for Leo.
tagline: He's the biggest stud in the big apple!
title: New York City Pro
